reviews.text: This place was cheap, so I shouldn't complain, but the rooms really are in serious need of remodeling.
reviews.title: Ok

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is supposed to have a pool, but they said it was not currently operational. It is well situated in the middle of town.
reviews.title: The Price Was Right

reviews.text: The Riverview was a great place to stay this beautiful summer's day weekend. Came to Hood River to do some geocaching. The weather was excellent, as was this Hotel. The price was right. Very roomy, with all the basics. The room was clean and comfortable. We were up stairs and had access to a very large patio, with a view of the mountains and river. The hotel/motel was very quiet and the bed was quite comfortable. The owner was very nice and quite helpful. We would stay here again...
reviews.title: Old lodge

reviews.text: Not the nicest hotel we've stayed in. Reasonable price tho. It was clean and large rooms. Covers for the electrical plug-ins were missing. The fan cover was missing. Wi-fi wasn't high speed and couldn't get it to work very well. This would not be my first choice to stay at, but I would stay again. Only used the room for sleeping.
reviews.title: Good value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have stayed there with friends. air conditioner in the room with two beds did not work well: it was very cold in one part and very hot in another. They have a small swimming pool which was good for the kids. The hotel is clean and the rooms are large.
reviews.title: Clean, nice walk to downtown.
